Simulation.name: simulation_type
Simulation.label: Simulation Type
whatsThis: - Full Cascade: Simulate full damage cascades, follow recoils
- Ions Only: Simulate only ions, do not follow recoils
- Cascades Only: Simulate recoil cascades

Simulation.name: screening_type
Simulation.label: Screening Type
Simulation.toolTip: Define the type of screening potential.
whatsThis: - Unscreened: Unscreened Coulomb potential
- Lenz-Jensen: Lenz-Jensen screening
- Kr-C: Kr-C screening
- Moliere - Moliere screening
- ZBL - Ziegler-Biersack-Littmark universal screening

Simulation.name: scattering_calculation
Simulation.label: Scattering Calculation
Simulation.toolTip: Define how ion scattering is calculated.
whatsThis: - Corteo 4-bit interpolation: Using 4-bit Corteo interpolation tables
- MAGICK formula: Analytical calculation using ZBL's formula

Simulation.name: eloss_calculation
Simulation.label: Energy Loss
Simulation.toolTip: Setting for electronic energy loss calculation.
whatsThis: Off: No energy loss calculation
Loss: Only energy loss is taken into account
Loss & Stragling: Both energy loss and straggling are calculated

Simulation.name: straggling_model
Simulation.label: Straggling Model
Simulation.toolTip: Model used for electronic straggling calculations.

Simulation.name: nrt_calculation
Simulation.label: NRT calculation
Simulation.toolTip: Define how to implement NRT in multielemental targets.
whatsThis: Per element: NRT calculated per recoil atom
Average: NRT calculated using material average values

Transport.name: min_energy
Transport.label: Energy cutoff (eV)
Transport.toolTip: Lowest kinetic energy of a simulated ion.
whatsThis: When the energy of an ion goes below this cutoff,
the ion history is terminated.

Transport.name: flight_path_type
Transport.label: Flight Path Type
whatsThis: - Atomic Spacing: Constant flight path equal to material's interatomic distance
- Constant: User defined constant flight path
- Mendenhall-Weller: SRIM-like path selection algorithm
- IPP: IONS++ algorithm

Transport.name: max_rel_eloss
Transport.label: Max Î”E/E
Transport.toolTip: Maximum relative energy loss per flight path.

Transport.name: max_mfp
Transport.label: Max MFP (nm)
Transport.toolTip: Maximum ion mean free path in nm.

IonBeam.name: ion_distribution
IonBeam.label: Ion Distribution
IonBeam.whatsThis: The entry surface is at x=0

IonBeam.name: pos
IonBeam.label: Position
whatsThis: Initial ion position vector [x,y,z].
Must be either within the simulation volume or at the surface.

Output.name: OutputFileBaseName
Output.label: Output File Name
Output.toolTip: Name of the output file without the extension.

Output.name: storage_interval
Output.label: Update interval (ms)
Output.toolTip: Time interval to update stored data.

Output.name: store_transmitted_ions
Output.label: Store transmitted ions
Output.toolTip: Store a table with ions that exit the simulation.

Output.name: store_pka
Output.label: Store PKAs
Output.toolTip: Store a table of PKA data.

Output.name: store_dedx
Output.label: Store dE/dx
Output.toolTip: Store stopping tables for each ion/material combination.

Driver.name: max_no_ions
Driver.label: Max # of ions to simulate
Driver.toolTip: Maximum number of histories to simulate.
Driver.whatsThis: The simulation will stop when the maximum number of histories has been reached.

Driver.name: threads
Driver.label: Number of threads
Driver.whatsThis: The simulation will run in parallel the specified .

Target.name: cell_size
Target.label: Cell Size [lx, ly, lz] (nm)
Target.toolTip: Size in nm of the simulation cell along the x-, y- and z-axis.

Target.name: cell_count
Target.label: Cell count [Nx, Ny, Nz]
Target.toolTip: Number of simulation cells along the x-, y- and z-axis.

Target.name: periodic_bc
Target.label: Periodic boundary [x, y, z]
Target.toolTip: Select periodic boundary conditions along the axes (0=normal, 1=periodic).
